caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to the offense of child grooming.
summary: This bill amends the Code of Criminal Procedure to include child grooming as a reportable offense requiring sex offender registration in Texas. The law applies equally to all offenders regardless of nationality, including Chinese immigrants. Any person convicted of child grooming will need to register as a sex offender, which impacts their residence, employment, and travel requirements.
translation: 该法案修改德克萨斯州刑事诉讼法，将儿童诱骗行为列入需要进行性犯罪者登记的应报告犯罪。该法律平等适用于所有犯罪者，包括中国移民。任何被判犯有儿童诱骗罪的人都必须登记为性犯罪者，这将影响其居住、就业和出行要求。
